titleStmt.title: Politick maxims and observations written by the most learned Hugo Grotius translated for the ease and benefit of the English states-men. By H.C. S.T.B.
titleStmt.author: Grotius, Hugo, 1583-1645.
Campanella, Tommaso, 1568-1639.
H.C., S.T.B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Princes Armes in Saint Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Based on: Campanella, Tommaso. Realis philosophiæ epilogisticae partes quatuor.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Princes Armes in Saint Paul's Church-yard.
